smaex/additional-payment-checks.description: Enables additional checks for payment methods in Magento 2.
smaex/additional-payment-checks.name: Additional Payment Checks

smaex/customer-group-payments.description: Restricts payment methods to specific customer groups in Magento 2.
smaex/customer-group-payments.name: Customer Group Payments

smile/elasticsuite.description: A feature-rich merchandising suite for Magento 2.
smile/elasticsuite.name: ElasticSuite for Magento 2

swissup/module-breeze.description: A Magento 2 extension that replaces Luma's js stack with its own implementation.
swissup/module-breeze.name: Breeze

swissup/module-marketplace.description: Magento modules and themes CLI/GUI downloader and installer
swissup/module-marketplace.name: Marketplace

swissup/module-search-mysql-legacy.description: MySQL is no longer supported for search since Magento 2.4. This extension brings back the usage of the MySQL search engine on Magento 2.
swissup/module-search-mysql-legacy.name: Legacy Mysql Search

veriteworks/cookiefix.description: This extension is adjusting the Cookie SameSite attribute issue since Chrome 80.
veriteworks/cookiefix.name: Extension for Cookie SameSite attribute

wizkunde/magento2-packagist.description: Connect your Magento 2 webshop to private packagist and distribute extensions to your customer smarter
wizkunde/magento2-packagist.name: Magento 2 Private Packagist Integration

wpoortman/magehook.description: This extension adds an abstraction layer to create and dispatch custom webhooks for Magento 2.
wpoortman/magehook.name: Magehook

yireo/magento2-next-gen-images.description: Magento 2 module to add next-gen image support to Magento 2.
yireo/magento2-next-gen-images.name: Magento 2 module for NextGenImages

yireo/magento2-replace-all.description: A composer meta-package that removes numerous Magento 2 modules
yireo/magento2-replace-all.name: Magento 2 removal of all optional modules

yireo/magento2-theme-override-checker.description: Magento module to find all files of a given Magento theme (for example Magento/luma), compare the found files with the parent theme (and/or modules) and return whether there are differences or not.
yireo/magento2-theme-override-checker.name: Yireo ThemeOverrideChecker

yireo/magento2-webp2.description: This extension adds WebP support to Magento 2.
yireo/magento2-webp2.name: Magento 2 module for WebP

yireo/yireo_checkouttester2.description: A simple extension to preview the checkout success-page at any time.
yireo/yireo_checkouttester2.name: CheckoutTester module for Magento 2

yireo/yireo_disablelog2.description: This module disables various log attempts of the Magento core, improving performance slightly.
yireo/yireo_disablelog2.name: DisableLog2 for Magento 2

yireo/yireo_googletagmanager2.description: Add Google Tag Manager to Magento2
yireo/yireo_googletagmanager2.name: Yireo GoogleTagManager2

yireo/yireo_whoops.description: Magento 2 module integrating Whoops error handling.
yireo/yireo_whoops.name: Magento 2 module for Whoops

yvoronoy/m2install.description: A script designed to simplify the installation process of Magento 2 and rapid deployment of merchant code and DB dumps.
yvoronoy/m2install.name: Magento 2 Bash Install/Restore Script

yvoronoy/magento2-bash-completion.description: This plugin adds autocompletion for Magento 2 CLI Sub Commands and their Options
yvoronoy/magento2-bash-completion.name: Magento 2 bash completion

zepgram/module-disable-search-engine.description: This Magento 2 module allow you to disable entirely Elasticsearch service: useful when research and categories are not used.
zepgram/module-disable-search-engine.name: Zepgram DisableSearchEngine

zepgram/module-json-schema.description: Magento 2 module to validate JSON Structures against a given Schema.
zepgram/module-json-schema.name: Zepgram JsonSchema

zepgram/module-multi-threading.description: This extension allows processing large data collections in parallel using multiple child processes, improving performance and reducing processing time.
zepgram/module-multi-threading.name: Multi-Threading for Magento 2

zepgram/module-rest.description: Technical Magento 2 module providing simple development pattern, configurations and optimizations to make REST API requests toward external services based on Guzzle Client.
zepgram/module-rest.name: Zepgram Rest

zepgram/module-zero-downtime-deployment.description: Disable native change detection from Magento 2 to allow implementation of Zero Downtime Deployment Strategy (ZDD).
zepgram/module-zero-downtime-deployment.name: Zepgram ZeroDownTimeDeployment
